participant_1.background:
I went to a local metal show for my last birthday.
i was the first test child for sesame street.
i have a farm with pigs , horses and hens.
my favorite pizza is pepperoni.
I'm not into superheroes, but I love to capture the beauty of the rain and my cats.

participant_2.background:
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
i have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.
my favorite class is painting.

content.text: What did you do for your last birthday?
I went to a family reunion at my uncle's farm.
That sounds fun! Do you like farm animals?
Yes! I love pigs and horses. What's your favorite animal?
I love cats! I have a farm with pigs, horses, and hens.
That sounds amazing! I wish I had a farm.
It's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is. What's your favorite thing about your farm?
I love spending time with the animals and watching them grow.
That sounds so peaceful. I wish I could live on a farm.
You should! It's a great way of life.
